dt-example.title: Custom Button Text
dt-example.info:
This example shows how the button text for the `-button savedStates` can be customised to include the number of states that are saved within StateRestore.
The default for StateRestore is to just show the `Saved States` text, the example below shows how the `-init language.buttons.savedStates` language option has to be customised to include the count in the button's text. A listener is then set for the `-event stateRestore-change` event, which updates the relevant buttons text.
It is also possible to include the number of states in the text for the `-button savedStatesCreate` button.
